name: Derrick Gilchrist
coverLetter:
I have a OLCC workers permit and am currently working at stated company's as a trimmer of dried cured cannabis, cultivation of all stages of cannabis growth and use of RAW joint rolling machine for orders and product packaging. With ever changing industries such as this we must always look to further our skills and knowledge. With that I feel very confident in identifying various forms of ailments in the cannabis plant. On average a day of trimming will exceed 1,000 grams. For contact reference contact Brian +1 (503) 828-8566 or Sam +1 (503) 490-6366
